data.title: MMORPG Fantasy Online Game
data.meta_description: Pirate Clan is a free click MMORPG filled with fantasy and adventure. Pillage and plunder for treasure, sail the oceans and find friends in this social game!
data.text:
Master the high seas, plunder for treasure and battle against other captains in this epic pirate MMORPG! What arrr you waiting for?

Drink with yer mateys, rob a buccaneer, sabotage a rivalâ€™s ship, raise yer Jolly Roger and search for buried treasure. Take everything and give nothing back!

The rougher the seas, the smoother we sail. Ahoy!
